explanation: [0-0] The scene takes place in an outdoor courtyard where a man in a tie-dye shirt and a woman in a red sari are celebrating Holi. The man in the tie-dye shirt is trying to pull the woman in the red sari outside, while the woman is trying to resist. Two children and a woman in a pink sari are also standing in the doorway.
